headline: Howmet Aerospace to Present at Bernstein's 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference (SDC)
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE: HWM) announced today that John C. Plant, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer will speak at Bernstein's 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference (SDC) on Friday, May 30th, 2025, at 8:00 AM ET.

raw.headline: Howmet Aerospace to Present at Bernstein's 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference (SDC)
raw.summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE: HWM) announced today that John C. Plant, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer will speak at Bernstein's 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference (SDC) on Friday, May 30th, 2025, at 8:00 AM ET.

headline: Howmet Aerospace: Rating Downgrade As Valuation Has Likely Priced In Near-Term Upside
summary: Downgrading HWM to hold as valuation at 28x forward EBITDA now fully reflects near-term upside, making risk-reward less attractive.
